features: 1. Sleek and Stylish Design: The metal black napkin holder features a sleek and stylish design that effortlessly elevates the visual appeal of your dining space. Its modern aesthetic adds a touch of sophistication to any table setting, making the napkin holder for table standout accessory for both everyday use and special occasions.

2. Compact Dimensions for Space Efficiency: With a length of 5.4 inches, width of 2.17 inches, and a height of 5.04 inches, this napkin holders for kitchen is thoughtfully designed to maximize space efficiency on your table or countertop. The compact dimensions ensure that it seamlessly integrates into your dining setup without clutter, offering a neat and organized appearance.

3. Durable Metal Construction for Longevity: Crafted from high-quality metal, our black napkin holder is built to withstand daily use, providing long-lasting durability. The sturdy construction ensures that the napkin holders remains a reliable and functional accessory, maintaining its quality even with regular handling.

4. Chic Black Finish for Versatility: The chic black finish of the napkin dispenser adds a touch of modernity, making it a versatile addition to various decor styles. Whether you're hosting a formal dinner party or enjoying a casual meal with family, the table napkin holder finish complements any setting, enhancing the overall aesthetic.

5. Easy to Clean and Maintain: Designed with user convenience in mind, the metal black napkins holder is easy to clean and maintain. Simply wipe it down with a damp cloth to keep it looking pristine, ensuring that your focus remains on enjoying meals rather than worrying about upkeep.

reviews.reviewerName: Gracias por el cambio de articulo,super rápido. El producto es tal cual como en la fotoGracias por el cambio de articulo,super rápido. El producto es tal cual como en la foto
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars JJOO Black Napkin Holder
reviews.reviewText: Another great item to re-purpose!!! I use napkin holders to keep my desk organized. Since they are rarely wider than 2.5 inches then one can use them to store smaller items which would otherwise clutter up a desk. One of mine holds small writing note pads, another booklets I may need off-and-on such as those for cable or AC and Kindle usage instructions, etc. This particular one will be used to hold a three year calendar and a book with all my web page information.It is sturdy and stands well on its own even when I pull an item out. Since the sides are multi-layered, different sizes can be used. Even though I am not using it for napkins, this attractive holder would look good sitting on a kitchen counter or on a dining room table. It would look equally good holding every day napkins or those designed for entertainment. The black color would not clash with whatever color napkins being used. FInally, this item is a steal at $5.99 at the time of this review. A five star item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect & sturdy napkin holder
reviews.reviewText: Is it weird to love a napkin holder? This is a GREAT value for the price. It has a sleek and clean design. It is also very sturdy. I suppose one would expect most napkin holders to be sturdy, but i got this to replace a very thin napkin holder that would fall down whenever it wasn't holding napkins (which is its whole job???) Anyway, *this* napkin holder is stable and I am very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classy napkin holder
reviews.reviewText: Got this a couple weeks ago and have been using it since then. No issues so far, its a simple construction but doesn't move too much on our granite countertop.Will update if any issues but our's came well packaged and didnt have any bends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Napkin holder well made, but a bit short
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this napkin holder for by RV. It is well made. I just wish it was a bit taller. I like to use the larger quality dinner napkins and I am finding they bend over at the top making it somewhat difficult to pull a napkin out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I don’t know why it has been so hard for me to find the perfect napkin holder, but here it is! It is the perfect size and looks good with smaller and larger napkins. It is not too wide, so you don’t have to completely stuff it with 100 napkins, which I really appreciate. Sometimes with other napkin holders, if you don’t have enough napkins, they will flop over and look weird, but not in this one. It is made of black metal and has four little round balls on the bottom, which I'm sure will help prevent your counter from scratching. It says it’s for indoor and outdoor use but I only use it indoor. What a great price for this. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Durable, well made and better than I expected
reviews.reviewText: This JJOO Black Metal Napkin Holder is simple, well made and at a great price point.It measures 5.25 (W) x 5 (H) x 2.25 (D) and is a nice compact design that does not take up much space and can easily match any decor. It is supported by 4 legs and can hold a nice amount of napkins. I was surprised by the weight and durability for the price point.It is better than I expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Napkin Holder
reviews.reviewText: Heavy steel rods give it a substantial feel and weight. Does not hold a huge stack of napkins but looks nice and delicate on the table and is very decorative. We like it very much.
